channel.title: Comments on: The Top Search Result For Prologue

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
@Joe -
Hehehe, I was going to suggest something about Live Search not indexing blogs very well (or at all?), but your theory works too :-)
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Joe Cheng [MSFT]
item.dc:creator: Joe Cheng [MSFT]
item.description: I speculate that the three search engines use different algorithms to determine relevance, and this can and often does result in different results being returned. The end. :)
item.content:encoded: I speculate that the three search engines use different algorithms to determine relevance, and this can and often does result in different results being returned. The end. ðŸ™‚
